main event: An airman reported a sighting of an unidentified object approximately twice the length of a British girl rail, estimated at 40 feet altitude, which remained stationary for about 4.9 seconds before disappearing behind trees.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be the size of a squadron of 13 fighter planes., The sighting lasted for approximately 4.9 seconds., The airman was unable to identify the azimuth of the object., The observation took place in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina under scattered clouds with unlimited visibility., No photographs were included with the report.
